titles: The tragedie of King Richard the second As it hath beene publikely acted by the right Honourable the Lorde Chamberlaine his Seruants.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Printed by Valentine Simmes for Androw Wise, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules church yard at the signe of the Angel,
notes: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Richard --  II, --  King of England, 1367-1400 --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
